TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed BindingFlags extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定控制繫結的旗標和由反映執行的成員和類型搜尋方式。

span.span: Specifies flags that control binding and the way in which the search for members and types is conducted by reflection.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這些`BindingFlags`控制的優越，繫結中的許多類別`System`， `System.Reflection`，和`System.Runtime`叫用、 建立、 get、 set 和尋找成員和類型的命名空間。These `BindingFlags` control binding for a great many classes in the `System`, `System.Reflection`, and `System.Runtime` namespaces that invoke, create, get, set, and find members and types. `BindingFlags` 會以下列方法和其他位置，例如:`BindingFlags` are used in the following methods and other places such as : - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - `InvokeMember` 和`GetMethod`特別地重要。`InvokeMember` and `GetMethod` are especially important. 繫結旗標可以分類所識別的型別成員的方式，為下表所列。The binding flags can be categorized by how they identify a type member, as listed in the following table. |識別協助工具Identified by Accessibility|引數繫結所識別Identified by Binding Argument|由作業Identified by Operation| |---------------------------------|------------------------------------|-----------------------------| |DeclaredOnlyDeclaredOnly

FlattenHierarchyFlattenHierarchy

IgnoreCaseIgnoreCase

IgnoreReturnIgnoreReturn

執行個體Instance

NonPublicNonPublic

PublicPublic

StaticStatic|ExactBindingExactBinding

OptionalParamBindingOptionalParamBinding|CreateInstanceCreateInstance

GetFieldGetField

SetFieldSetField

GetPropertyGetProperty

SetPropertySetProperty

InvokeMethodInvokeMethod

PutDispPropertyPutDispProperty

PutRefDispPropertyPutRefDispProperty| > [!NOTE] > 您必須指定`Instance`或`Static`連同`Public`或`NonPublic`或會傳回任何成員。You must specify `Instance` or `Static` along with `Public` or `NonPublic` or no members will be returned. 下表列出由預設的強制型轉。The following table lists the coercions performed by the default . 此表格適用於特別`ExactBinding`繫結旗標。This table applies especially to the `ExactBinding` binding flag. |來源類型Source Type|目標類型Target Type| |-----------------|-----------------| |任何型別Any type|其基底類型。Its base type.| |任何型別Any type|它所實作的介面。The interface it implements.| |`Char`|`UInt16`, `UInt32`, `Int32`, `UInt64`, `Int64`, `Single`, `Double``UInt16`, `UInt32`, `Int32`, `UInt64`, `Int64`, `Single`, `Double`| |`Byte`|`Char`, `UInt16`, `Int16`, `UInt32`, `Int32`, `UInt64`, `Int64`, `Single`, `Double``Char`, `UInt16`, `Int16`, `UInt32`, `Int32`, `UInt64`, `Int64`, `Single`, `Double`| |`SByte`|`Int16`, `Int32`, `Int64`, `Single`, `Double``Int16`, `Int32`, `Int64`, `Single`, `Double`| |`UInt16`|`UInt32`, `Int32`, `UInt64`, `Int64`, `Single`, `Double``UInt32`, `Int32`, `UInt64`, `Int64`, `Single`, `Double`| |`Int16`|`Int32`、`Int64`、`Single``Double``Int32`, `Int64`, `Single`, `Double`| |`UInt32`|`UInt64`、`Int64`、`Single``Double``UInt64`, `Int64`, `Single`, `Double`| |`Int32`|`Int64`, `Single`, `Double``Int64`, `Single`, `Double`| |`UInt64`|`Single`, `Double``Single`, `Double`| |`Int64`|`Single`, `Double``Single`, `Double`| |`Single`|`Double`| |非參考Non-reference|所參考。By-reference.| ## Examples 下列範例示範多種繫結旗標。The following example demonstrates many of the binding flags. [!code-cpp[BindingFlags#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/BindingFlags/CPP/bindingflagssample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[BindingFlags#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/BindingFlags/CS/bindingflagssample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[BindingFlags#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/BindingFlags/VB/bindingflagssample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Reflection.BindingFlags CreateInstance = int32(512)

summary.span: 指定反映應該建立指定類型的執行個體。

span.span: Specifies that reflection should create an instance of the specified type.

summary.span: 呼叫符合指定引數的建構函式。

span.span: Calls the constructor that matches the given arguments.

summary.span: 所提供的成員名稱會被忽略。

span.span: The supplied member name is ignored.

summary.span: 如果未指定查閱類型，則會套用 (Instance | Public)。

span.span: If the type of lookup is not specified, (Instance | Public) will apply.

summary.span: 無法呼叫類型初始設定式。

span.span: It is not possible to call a type initializer.

summary.span: 這個旗標會傳遞至 方法以叫用建構函式。

span.span: This flag is passed to an method to invoke a constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Reflection.BindingFlags DeclaredOnly = int32(2)

summary.span: 指定只應考慮在所提供類型之階層層級宣告的成員。

span.span: Specifies that only members declared at the level of the supplied type's hierarchy should be considered.

summary.span: 不考慮繼承的成員。

span.span: Inherited members are not considered.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Reflection.BindingFlags Default = int32(0)

summary.span: 指定不定義任何繫結旗標。

span.span: Specifies that no binding flags are defined.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Reflection.BindingFlags DoNotWrapExceptions = int32(33554432)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Reflection.BindingFlags ExactBinding = int32(65536)

summary.span: 指定所提供的引數類型必須完全符合對應的型式參數類型。

span.span: Specifies that types of the supplied arguments must exactly match the types of the corresponding formal parameters.

summary.span: 如果呼叫端提供非 Null 的 物件，則反映會擲回例外狀況，因為那表示呼叫端正在提供會選擇適當方法的 實作。

span.span: Reflection throws an exception if the caller supplies a non-null object, since that implies that the caller is supplying implementations that will pick the appropriate method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 反映模型一般類型系統的存取範圍的規則。Reflection models the accessibility rules of the common type system. 例如，如果呼叫端在相同的組件，呼叫端不需要特殊權限的內部成員。For example, if the caller is in the same assembly, the caller does not need special permissions for internal members. 否則，呼叫端需要。Otherwise, the caller needs . 這是一致的受保護的成員查閱、 private、 等等。This is consistent with lookup of members that are protected, private, and so on. 一般原則是應該執行僅擴展強制型轉，永遠不會遺失資料。The general principle is that should perform only widening coercions, which never lose data. 擴展強制型轉的範例強制為 64 位元帶正負號的整數值的 32 位元帶正負號的整數的值。An example of a widening coercion is coercing a value that is a 32-bit signed integer to a value that is a 64-bit signed integer. 這被區分縮小強制，可能會遺失資料。This is distinguished from a narrowing coercion, which may lose data. 縮小強制型轉的範例強制 64 位元帶正負號的整數，32 位元帶正負號的整數。An example of a narrowing coercion is coercing a 64-bit signed integer to a 32-bit signed integer. 預設繫結器會忽略此旗標，而自訂的繫結器可實作這個旗標的語意。The default binder ignores this flag, while custom binders can implement the semantics of this flag.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Reflection.BindingFlags FlattenHierarchy = int32(64)

summary.span: 指定應傳回在階層架構上的公用和受保護的靜態成員。

span.span: Specifies that public and protected static members up the hierarchy should be returned.

summary.span: 不會傳回繼承類別中的私用靜態成員。

span.span: Private static members in inherited classes are not returned.

summary.span: 靜態成員包括欄位、方法、事件和屬性。

span.span: Static members include fields, methods, events, and properties.

summary.span: 不會傳回巢狀類型。

span.span: Nested types are not returned.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Reflection.BindingFlags GetField = int32(1024)

summary.span: 指定應傳回所指定欄位的值。

span.span: Specifies that the value of the specified field should be returned.

summary.span: 這個旗標會傳遞至 方法以取得欄位值。

span.span: This flag is passed to an method to get a field value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Reflection.BindingFlags GetProperty = int32(4096)

summary.span: 指定應傳回所指定屬性的值。

span.span: Specifies that the value of the specified property should be returned.

summary.span: 這個旗標會傳遞至 方法以叫用屬性 getter。

span.span: This flag is passed to an method to invoke a property getter.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Reflection.BindingFlags IgnoreCase = int32(1)

summary.span: 指定繫結時不應考慮成員名稱的大小寫。

span.span: Specifies that the case of the member name should not be considered when binding.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Reflection.BindingFlags IgnoreReturn = int32(16777216)

summary.span: 用於 COM Interop 以指定可忽略成員的傳回值。

span.span: Used in COM interop to specify that the return value of the member can be ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Reflection.BindingFlags Instance = int32(4)

summary.span: 指定要在搜尋中包含執行個體成員。

span.span: Specifies that instance members are to be included in the search.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Reflection.BindingFlags InvokeMethod = int32(256)

summary.span: 指定要叫用方法。

span.span: Specifies that a method is to be invoked.

summary.span: 這不能是建構函式或類型初始設定式。

span.span: This must not be a constructor or a type initializer.

summary.span: 這個旗標會傳遞至 方法以叫用方法。

span.span: This flag is passed to an method to invoke a method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Reflection.BindingFlags NonPublic = int32(32)

summary.span: 指定要在搜尋中包含非公用成員。

span.span: Specifies that non-public members are to be included in the search.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Reflection.BindingFlags OptionalParamBinding = int32(262144)

summary.span: 傳回成員集，其參數計數會符合所提供的引數數目。

span.span: Returns the set of members whose parameter count matches the number of supplied arguments.

summary.span: 這個繫結旗標可用於其參數具有預設值的方法，以及具有變數引數 (varargs) 的方法。

span.span: This binding flag is used for methods with parameters that have default values and methods with variable arguments (varargs).

summary.span: 這個旗標應該只搭配 使用。

span.span: This flag should only be used with .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有預設值的參數僅用於呼叫會省略尾端的引數的位置。Parameters with default values are used only in calls where trailing arguments are omitted. 它們必須是最後一個引數。They must be the last arguments.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Reflection.BindingFlags Public = int32(16)

summary.span: 指定要在搜尋中包含公用成員。

span.span: Specifies that public members are to be included in the search.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Reflection.BindingFlags PutDispProperty = int32(16384)

summary.span: 指定應叫用 COM 物件上的 成員。

span.span: Specifies that the member on a COM object should be invoked.

summary.span: 會指定使用值的屬性設定函式。

span.span: specifies a property-setting function that uses a value.

summary.span: 如果屬性同時具有 和 ，而且必須區分呼叫哪一個，則使用 。

span.span: Use if a property has both and and you need to distinguish which one is called.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Reflection.BindingFlags PutRefDispProperty = int32(32768)

summary.span: 指定應叫用 COM 物件上的 成員。

span.span: Specifies that the member on a COM object should be invoked.

summary.span: 會指定使用參考而非值的屬性設定函式。

span.span: specifies a property-setting function that uses a reference instead of a value.

summary.span: 如果屬性同時具有 和 ，而且必須區分呼叫哪一個，則使用 。

span.span: Use if a property has both and and you need to distinguish which one is called.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Reflection.BindingFlags SetField = int32(2048)

summary.span: 指定應設定所指定欄位的值。

span.span: Specifies that the value of the specified field should be set.

summary.span: 這個旗標會傳遞至 方法以設定欄位值。

span.span: This flag is passed to an method to set a field value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Reflection.BindingFlags SetProperty = int32(8192)

summary.span: 指定應設定所指定屬性的值。

span.span: Specifies that the value of the specified property should be set.

summary.span: 對於 COM 屬性來說，指定這個繫結旗標等同於指定 和 。

span.span: For COM properties, specifying this binding flag is equivalent to specifying and .

summary.span: 這個旗標會傳遞至 方法以叫用屬性 setter。

span.span: This flag is passed to an method to invoke a property setter.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Reflection.BindingFlags Static = int32(8)

summary.span: 指定要在搜尋中包含靜態成員。

span.span: Specifies that static members are to be included in the search.
